description: Based on GeoBase data and data from Natural Resources Canada, these high-quality National Geographic illustrated maps are revised regularly in co-operation with Parks Canada. Printed on synthetic paper that's waterproof and tear-resistant, the map holds up to handling and repeated use. This version includes trail distances for the North Boundary, Maligne Valley, Miette Hot Springs, Mount Robson Provincial Park, and Berg Lake. Approximate scale is 1:100,000.
name: Jasper North Trail Map
